column4: Please, how do I get my ATI x600 mobility to work with the new Breezer :S:?
I can provide SSH to it.
Please anyone, I've just bought this laptop and I really want to make it work..
lol.. good luck, took me 5 laptops to get mine working
Would you mind having a go at mine then
what do you need?
whats the video card on it?
An ATI X600 Mobility.
did u check ati's website? they're slow in getting linux drivers, but they usually do eventually make them
Yes, and I've also run them... but it doesn't work.
you need to edit your Xorg.conf file too
did you do that?
lol
I would just read all the details in the readme's that came with the drivers
they're usually apain in the ass, but thats the only thing you can do
from my experience Ubuntu is best on laptops
you can try fedora core
try commenting out dri in the Modules section in xorg.conf
are you trying to play games or watch movies orwhat?
I'm trying to make tuxracer run
welll i dunno for tux racer, but you can try and mess with mplayer -vo, try "mplayer -vo help" and try different drivers
